DOC.brief_summary: A couple achieve pregnancy though regular attempt year define infertile couple . This condition cause faulty functioning reproduction system husband wife . If organic defect definite injury reproductive system ( ova spermatozoon ) , specialist doctor generally decide put couple fertility treatment program . Artificial insemination one important way achieve pregnancy . Three common method artificial insemination : 1 . Placement diaphragm contain raw spermatozoon isolate improved spermatozoa appropriate liquid solution ( Cup insemination , CI ) upon cervix . 2 . Spermatozoa injection ( improvement ) vagina cervix ( Intra-Cervical Insemination , ICI ) . 3 . Spermatozoa injection ( improvement ) directly uterus ( IUI-Intra-Uterine Insemination ) . The EVIE - Slow Release Insemination method : The slow release insemination utilize Grasby type MS16 pump 3 hour . The release rate motile spermatozoa 50X103 per minute . Advantages : - Very close approximation natural procedure spermatozoon arrive fertilization site long period . - An extended `` window opportunity '' meet ovum spermatozoon longer . - There loss spermatozoon due leak sometimes happen single-time injection practice IUI method . Primary Endpoint : Accumulation 50 cycle SRI- slow release insemination ( study group ) addition 50 cycle regular IUI ( control group ) . Two week insemination Beta hCG test Secondary Endpoints : Four week insemination - US Viability scan Procedure : Subjects woman fertility difficulty designate IUI treatment . 100 insemination cycle conduct . ( 50 regular IUI 50 EVIE-SRI ) . Subjects treat IUI method become pregnant treat EVIE-Slow Release method vice versa .
